name: Virgina's Tuna Salad
author: KRISTIEV
summary: This was always a summer Saturday favorite for my grandparents and I. Great served on a large lettuce leaf. You may also add grapes or chopped apples if you wish.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked
directions: Place egg in a saucepan and cover with cold water
Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat
Cover and let egg stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes
Remove from hot water; cool for 5 minutes
Peel and chop into bite-sized pieces
In a medium bowl, mix together tuna and mayonnaise
Mix in egg, celery, relish, and black pepper
